boards.name: RAMPS 1.4 (EFB)
boards.notes: Classic Arduino Mega + RAMPS combo. EFB = Extruder, Fan, Bed

boards.name: RAMPS 1.4 (EEB)
boards.notes: Dual extruder configuration. EEB = Extruder, Extruder, Bed

boards.name: RAMPS 1.4 (EFF)
boards.notes: No heated bed configuration. EFF = Extruder, Fan, Fan

boards.name: RAMPS Plus 3
boards.notes: Improved RAMPS with better MOSFETs and fuses

boards.name: Mini RAMBo
boards.notes: Compact RAMBo with integrated A4982 drivers

boards.name: Einsy RAMBo
boards.notes: Prusa's integrated board with TMC2130 drivers

boards.name: Einsy Retro
boards.notes: Upgrade board for older Prusa printers

boards.name: Sanguinololu 1.1
boards.notes: Legacy board - very limited flash space

boards.name: Sanguinololu 1.2
boards.notes: Legacy board with more flash than 1.1

boards.name: Anet 1.0
boards.notes: FIRE HAZARD - Upgrade recommended! Poor MOSFET design

boards.name: MKS Base 1.4
boards.notes: Improved MKS Base with USB fix

boards.name: MKS Gen L
boards.notes: Affordable RAMPS alternative with removable drivers

boards.name: Creality V4.2.2
boards.notes: VERIFY YOUR MCU: Some use RET6 (512KB) - check physical chip!

boards.name: Creality V4.2.5
boards.notes: Found on some Ender 5 Pro printers

boards.name: Creality V4.2.7
boards.notes: Silent board with TMC2208 drivers in standalone mode

boards.name: Creality V4.5.2
boards.notes: Newer Creality board for S1 series

boards.name: Creality V2.4.S1_301 (F4)
boards.notes: F4 variant of S1 Plus board

boards.name: Creality CR-4NTXXS (F401)
boards.notes: F401 based board for Ender 5 S1

boards.name: BTT SKR Mini E3 V1.0
boards.notes: First Mini E3 - Direct Ender 3 replacement

boards.name: BTT SKR Pico
boards.notes: Raspberry Pi RP2040 based - Voron 0 popular

boards.name: BTT Octopus Pro V1.0
boards.notes: Pro version with high-voltage driver support

boards.name: MKS Robin Nano V3
boards.notes: F4 MCU with WiFi and TFT support

boards.name: Anet ET4
boards.notes: Stock Anet ET4 board with A4988

boards.name: BTT E3 RRF
boards.notes: Designed for RepRapFirmware but works with Marlin
